edit.instruction: Transform this portrait image into 16:9 landscape format and replace the background with the iconic Taj Mahal. The Taj Mahal should be visible in the background with its white marble domes and minarets, beautiful gardens, and reflecting pools. Expand the image horizontally to create a cinematic 16:9 landscape composition.

result.background: Successfully replaced with Taj Mahal including minarets, reflecting pools, and gardens
result.composition: Cinematic with model positioned using rule of thirds
result.aspect_ratio_note: Image maintains portrait-like dimensions (832x1248) rather than true 16:9 landscape. Edit mode has limitations with dramatic aspect ratio changes.

preserved_elements: Banarasi silk saree with gold zari brocade
new_elements: Taj Mahal with white marble minarets in background

generation_details.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted proportions, unrealistic Taj Mahal, poor quality, changed model features, altered saree, modified jewelry, inconsistent lighting, cropped composition, portrait orientation

quality_notes.background_quality: Excellent - Taj Mahal looks authentic with proper architectural details
quality_notes.lighting_integration: Good - Outdoor lighting complements the scene
quality_notes.composition: Strong - Model well-positioned with iconic monument
quality_notes.aspect_ratio_limitation: Edit mode cannot dramatically change aspect ratios. For true 16:9, regeneration would be needed.
